actions.committee: Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs (Formerly:  Post Office and Civil Service)
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs (Formerly:  Post Office and Civil Service).

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide vacation leave for residents of Alaska serving a tour of duty at a hardship station in Alaska.

summary.text: Requires Federal agencies to pay an employee whose place of residence is Alaska, and who has completed a tour of duty at a hardship station in that State, the cost of transportation to such residence for vacation leave before such employee begins another tour of duty in certain locations.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide vacation leave for residents of Alaska serving a tour of duty at a hardship station in Alaska.
